name: km
description:
A quick (and hopefully fun) strategy game about flipping a coin... for money.

Esc - Pause
R - Restart

Didn't have enough time to add tooltips for the item descriptions, and although I tried to make all the item descriptions sort of self explanatory, I'm not sure that that got the meaning across. 

So here's a little list:
x2 Money: +$2 money on Heads / -$2 on Tails

x10 Money: +$10  on Heads / -$10  on Tails

15% Luck: +15% Luck / -15% Luck after 5 coin flips.

0%/Oxymoron: Resets your money to 0.

H/T Flip: Switches the roles of heads and tails. If used again, the opposite effect will be applied.

Timer Sabotage (glitched item) - Pauses the timer for 30 seconds but afterwardst at the 30 second mark, the timer speeds up.

NOTE: x2 & x10 Money are not stackable. Shop items are randomized each time you open it.
